metadata.name: Recon Information for Export with PowerShell
metadata.comment: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-service ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-childitem ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-process '))) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('> $env:temp\\\\')))

output.summary: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data
